name: Liminal Isolation
description:
This project was done for a Game Development degree. It's a game inspired the universe of the collaborative fiction named "The Backrooms" where you play as an wanderer that by pure chance phased through the floor and now is on an unkown ambient. Your objective is to get out of this nightmarish place by fighting monsters and solving puzzles.

OST: https://www.bandlab.com/matapli/albums/69d43bb1-bd8a-ed11-9d7a-002248449537
